foreignData.name: Blendendes Leuchtfeuer
foreignData.text:
Streben — Das Blendende Leuchtfeuer kostet beim Wirken für jedes Ziel außer dem ersten {R} mehr.
Eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht blocken.

foreignData.name: Fulgor cegador
foreignData.text:
Esfuerzo — Lanzar el Fulgor cegador cuesta {R} más por cada objetivo después del primero.
Cualquier cantidad de criaturas objetivo no pueden bloquear este turno.

foreignData.name: Flamboiement aveuglant
foreignData.text:
Obstination — Le Flamboiement aveuglant coûte {R} de plus à lancer pour chaque cible après la première.
N'importe quel nombre de créatures ciblées ne peuvent pas bloquer ce tour-ci.

foreignData.name: Bagliore Accecante
foreignData.text:
Sforzo — Il Bagliore Accecante costa {R} in più per essere lanciato per ogni bersaglio oltre il primo.
Scegli un qualsiasi numero di creature bersaglio. Quelle creature non possono bloccare in questo turno.

foreignData.name: 眩しい炎
foreignData.text:
奮励 ― 眩しい炎を唱えるためのコストは、２つ目以降の対象１つにつき{R}多くなる。
望む数のクリーチャーを対象とする。このターン、それらではブロックできない。

foreignData.name: 눈이 머는 섬광
foreignData.text:
분투 — 눈이 머는 섬광은 한 개를 초과하는 목표의 수만큼 발동하는 데 {R}씩 비용이 더 든다.
생물을 원하는 수만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들은 이 턴에 방어할 수 없다.

foreignData.name: Clarão Cegante
foreignData.text:
Esforço — Clarão Cegante custa {R} a mais para ser conjurado para cada alvo além do primeiro.
Qualquer número de criaturas alvo não pode bloquear neste turno.

foreignData.name: Ослепительная Вспышка
foreignData.text:
Стремление — За каждую цель после первой разыгрывание Ослепительной Вспышки стоит на {R} больше.
Любое количество целевых существ не могут блокировать в этом ходу.

foreignData.name: 眩目火光
foreignData.text:
积力～眩目火光在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{R}来施放。
任意数量的目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

foreignData.name: 眩目火光
foreignData.text:
積力～眩目火光在第一個目標之外每有一個目標，便增加{R}來施放。
任意數量的目標生物本回合不能進行阻擋。

name: Blinding Flare
originalText:
Strive — Blinding Flare costs {R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures can't block this turn.

rulings.text: Blinding Flare can target any creature, including those you control.

You choose how many targets each spell with a strive ability has and what those targets are as you cast it. It's legal to cast such a spell with no targets, although this is rarely a good idea. You can't choose the same target more than once for a single strive spell.
The mana cost and mana value of strive spells don't change no matter how many targets they have. Strive abilities affect only what you pay.

If all of the spell's targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. If one or more of its targets are legal when it tries to resolve, the spell will resolve and affect only those legal targets. It will have no effect on any illegal targets.

If such a spell is copied, and the effect that copies the spell allows a player to choose new targets for the copy, the number of targets can't be changed. The player may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, the player can't choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
If a spell or ability allows you to cast a strive spell without paying its mana cost, you must pay the additional costs for any targets beyond the first.

text:
Strive — This spell costs {R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures can't block this turn.
